properties.description: RapidData Technologies is a system integrator specializing in digital transformation, with a focus on low-code, cloud, AI, big data, IoT, and consulting services. The company has between 501 and 1000 employees, is headquartered in Dubai, UAE, and offers solutions to optimize business operations and KPIs.
properties.content:
# The \#1 in Low Code, Cloud & AI

Why Settle for Less? Choose the Best in Low Code, Cloud, AI and Data. Get started.

[Get Free Consultation](https://www.rapiddata.com/free-consultation)

-->

- [facebook](https://www.facebook.com/RapidData-Technologies-101137391304582/)
- [twitter](https://twitter.com/RapiddataT)
- [linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/company/rapiddata-technologies/)
- [youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqWwweYpkBaRG8W9y3w-Hlg)

#### About us

## Looking for the Best IT Solution Partner?

RapidData Technologies is a leading system Integrator with many years of expertise in
implementing solutions to various corporations across the world. We help our clients
to fully digitize their operations, improve their KPIs and massively optimize their
operational cost. We are ISO 9001:2015, ISO 20000:2011, and ISO 27001:2013 certified company.

[**Mendix**\
**"Achieve new levels of business value with low code"** \
\
Accelerate time to value\
\
Future-proof everything\
\
Lower cost to ownership\
\
Fast-track business value\
\
View detail](https://www.rapiddata.com/mendix)

[**Cloud Computing** \
\
Meet the challenges of the evolving marketplace with our cloud-centered consultancy, engineering and training.\
\
View detail](https://www.rapiddata.com/cloud)

[**Data Science & Ai** \
\
Attune your organization to your data to create new opportunities while reducing risk\
\
View detail](https://www.rapiddata.com/artificial-intelligence)

## Driving Innovation Across Verticals

#### INSURANCE

RapidData's deep expertise in the Insurance industry can show
you how to deliver solutions that are transforming the Insurance
industry in the modern age.

#### ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENT

We work across all the major geographies, which equips us with
the expertise to understand all the underlying drivers in this
market sector.

#### HEALTH AND LIFE SCIENCES

We have successfully executed multiple projects for the
Healthcare sector to add business value by reducing operational
expense, improving customer experience and boosting performance.

#### FMCG AND RETAIL

We have designed repeatable growth models and innovation
pipelines that generate new products with higher potential and
lower risks of failure.

#### BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES

We have delivered IT solutions for large financial institutions
across the globe to execute mission critical projects.

#### GOVERNMENT AND RELATED ENTITIES

We are trusted partners for large government entities across the
globe to execute multi-million dollar projects.

## Proven Results That Speak for Themselves

#### Projects

# 250+

Successful Projects

#### Growth

# 3X

YoY Growth

#### Experts

# 500+

Emerging Tech Experts

#### Presence

# 22+

Countries Served Globally

#### Partnerships

# 40+

Strategic Technology Partnerships

#### Customers

# 100%

Satisfied customers

## Testimonials

### They Chose RapidData \- Here’s Why

##### Layla Al HashimiDigital Delivery ManagerGovernment Sector

"RapidData delivered our Mendix apps with incredible speed and precision. Their sprint discipline, architecture know-how, and UI/UX standards set them apart. As a top Mendix partner, they ensured scalable, secure, and maintainable builds—exceeding our internal goals and timelines."

##### James BrooksHead of AnalyticsNational Bank

"RapidData helped us design a modern big data ecosystem on a distributed architecture. From ingestion pipelines to real-time analytics, their engineers built scalable and governed solutions that power our enterprise dashboards and predictive models daily."

##### Alya Al SuwaidiInfrastructure HeadGlobal Logistics Firm

"Our Azure infrastructure was fragmented until RapidData stepped in. They unified environments, automated deployments, set up cost optimization practices, and enabled 24x7 monitoring. Today, we run smoothly with zero unplanned downtimes."

##### Iman Al ZahraDirector of TransformationPublic Sector Client

"RapidData deployed AI models that saved us thousands of hours in repetitive tasks. Their integration of NLP and decision engines into legacy systems was seamless. The improvement in accuracy and productivity is phenomenal."

##### Oliver CooperVP of EngineeringFintech Startup

"We brought in RapidData to improve our DevSecOps maturity. They established CI/CD pipelines, implemented security gates, and trained our teams on automated vulnerability scanning and compliance. Our software delivery is now safer, faster, and audit-ready."

##### Suresh NairChief Innovation OfficerHealthcare Group

"Working with RapidData’s AI team was a turning point. They didn’t just build models—they trained us on data readiness, ethics, and explainability. Their holistic approach to AI adoption gave us confidence and clarity in decision-making."

##### Alex MorganCTO, RetailDistribution Network

"RapidData executed a flawless migration to the cloud while rearchitecting our core services. Their expertise across multi-cloud deployments, containerization, and DevOps tools has given us agility and control. We now innovate faster, with lower TCO."

#### Our Customers

## Some of our customers & partners

company.name: RapidData
company.about: RapidData Technologies is a system integrator specializing in digital transformation, with a focus on low-code, cloud, AI, big data, IoT, and consulting services. The company has between 501 and 1000 employees, is headquartered in Dubai, UAE, and offers solutions to optimize business operations and KPIs.

evaluations.reasoning: LinkedIn lists RapidData’s company size as 501‑1,000 employees, and Tracxn reports the same 501‑1,000 employee range as of July 2024. These credible, recent sources confirm the company falls within the 501‑1000 employee range required by the criterion.

references.title: RapidData - LinkedIn
references.snippet: About us · Website: www.rapiddata.com · Industry: IT Services and IT Consulting · Company size: 501-1,000 employees · Headquarters: Dubai · Type: Privately Held.

references.title: RapidData - 2025 Company Profile, Competitors & Financials - Tracxn
references.snippet: How many employees does RapidData have? As of Jul 01, 2024, the latest employee count at RapidData is 501 - 1000. Where does RapidData rank ...

references.title: RapidData - Digital Transformation | IT Services | Consulting ...
references.snippet: RapidData Technologies is a leading system Integrator with many years of expertise in implementing solutions to various corporations across the world.

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates (UAE)
evaluations.reasoning: RapidData Technologies lists its headquarters as Dubai, United Arab Emirates on its LinkedIn profile, which is a reliable source for corporate location. A Tracxn company profile also states that RapidData is headquartered in Dubai, UAE. The company’s contact page lists a UAE address (Grosvenor Business Towers, Tecom, Barsha) and refers to RapidData Technologies Solutions LLC, indicating that the UAE office is the main corporate location. These sources collectively confirm that the company’s main headquarters is in the UAE, satisfying the criterion.

references.title: RapidData - 2025 Company Profile, Competitors & Financials - Tracxn
references.snippet: RapidData is headquartered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is registered at R Block No.138 Kovaipudur, Coimbatore, COIMBATORE, Tamil Nadu, ...

references.title: Contact Us | Get in Touch with RapidData Experts Today
references.snippet: United Arab Emirates (UAE). RapidData Technologies Solutions LLC. +971 45547151sales@rapiddata.com. Offices 1313-1314 Grosvenor Business Towers, Tecom, Barsha ...

references.title: RapidData - Digital Transformation | IT Services | Consulting ...
references.snippet: RapidData Technologies is a leading system Integrator with many years of expertise in implementing solutions to various corporations across the world.

evaluations.criterion: Company provides digital transformation consulting services
evaluations.reasoning: RapidData’s own website and internal profile explicitly state that they help clients fully digitize operations, improve KPIs, and optimize costs, and they offer services in low‑code, AI, big data, IoT, and cloud transformation. The dedicated "Digital Transformation" page on their site describes how they empower organizations to embrace digital transformation through cutting‑edge technologies, agile methodologies, and scalable solutions. These statements match the criterion of providing digital transformation consulting services, as they advise and implement digital technology adoption to improve business operations and processes.

references.title: RapidData - Digital Transformation | IT Services | Consulting ...
references.snippet: RapidData Technologies is a leading system Integrator with many years of expertise in implementing solutions to various corporations across the world.

references.title: Digital Transformation Services | Strategy to Execution | RapidData
references.snippet: RapidData empowers organizations to embrace digital transformation through cutting-edge technologies, agile methodologies, and scalable solutions.
